channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Weekend progress made against Southern California wildfires
item.description: Firefighters gained new ground over the weekend in combating three Southern California wildfires. Officials say increased humidity and light rain are expected to further aid firefightersâ€™ efforts over the next few days.

item.title: Tropical storm warning is issued for parts of the Carolinas
item.description: A tropical storm warning has been issued for part of the southeastern U.S. coast amid forecasts of heavy rains and coastal flooding that could affect the Carolinas.

item.title: Arizona man accused of online terror threats has been arrested in Montana
item.description: Authorities say an Arizona man wanted for allegedly making online terroristic threats has been arrested in Montana.
